source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_ropa_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_ropa_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ims_ropa_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSROPAID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                     AS IMSROPAID, -- surrogate key
    'No Info' AS	ROPAID	,
    'No Info' AS	ROPAIDCoded	,
    T1.name	AS	ROPAName	,
    T1.assigned_user_id	AS	ROPAAssignedUserID	,
    T1.assigned_user_name	AS	ROPAAssignedUserName	,
    T1.ims_ropa_number	AS	IMSROPANumber	,
    T1.type	AS	ROPAType	,
    T1.status	AS	ROPAStatus	,
    T1.priority	AS	ROPAPriority	,
    T1.organisation_areas_c	AS	ROPAOrganisationAreas	,
    T1.data_controllers_c	AS	ROPADataControllers	,
    T1.joint_controller_c	AS	ROPAJointController	,
    T1.categories_of_personal_data_c	AS	ROPACategoriesPersonalData	,
    T1.categories_of_recipients_c	AS	ROPACategoriesRecipients	,
    T1.security_measures_c	AS	ROPASecurityMeasures	,
    T1.third_country_names_c	AS	ThirdCountryNames	,
    T1.third_country_safeguards_c	AS	ThirdCountrySafeguards	,
    T1.legitimate_interest_c	AS	ROPALegitimateInterest	,
    T1.automated_decision_making_c	AS	ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking	,
    T1.data_source_c	AS	ROPADataSource	,
    T1.records_of_consent_c	AS	ROPARecordsOfConsent	,
    T1.location_of_data_c	AS	ROPADataLocation	,
    T1.dpia_required_c	AS	DPIARequired	,
    T1.dpia_status_c	AS	DPIAStatus	,
    T1.retention_policy_c	AS	ROPARetentionPolicy	,
    T1.retention_policy_applied_c	AS	ROPARetentionPolicyApplied	,
    T1.data_breach_record_c	AS	ROPADataBreachRecord	,
    T1.retention_not_adhered_c	AS	ROPARetentionNotAdhered	,
    T1.privacy_notice_c	AS	ROPAPrivacyNote	,
    T1.categories_of_individuals_c	AS	ROPACategoriesIndividuals	,
    IFNULL(T1.ropa_num_container_c, concat('ROPA - ',T1.ropa_num_container_c)) AS ROPANumberContainer,
    T1.help	AS	ROPAHelp	,
    T1.retention_schedule	AS	ROPARetentionSchedule	,
    T1.business_function	AS	ROPABusinessFunction	,
    T1.dpo	AS	ROPADPO	,
    T1.data_breach_occurred_c	AS	ROPADataBreachOcurred	,
    T1.last_current_and_accurate_da_c	AS	ROPALastCurrentAccurateData	,
    T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_c	AS	GDPRLawfulBasis	,
    T1.gdpr_special_category_conditio	AS	GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions	,
    T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_c	AS	DPA2018Schedule1Condition	,
    'No Info' AS	RightsOfDataSubject	,
    T1.business_function_unstructured	AS	BusinessFunctioinUnstructured	,
    T1.bdc_entity_temp_c	AS	BDCEntityTemp	,
    T1.cat_of_individuals_temp_c	AS	ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp	,
    'No Info'	AS	DocumentsIMSROPA	,
    'No Info'		AS	DocumentsIMSROPAName	,
    'No Info' AS	DocumentsIMSROPADocumentsIDA	,
    T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1	AS	IMSROPAIMSIntegration	,
    T1.estimated_number_of_operator_c	AS	EstimatedNumberOperator	,
    T1.user_id_c	AS	ROPAUserID	,
    T1.information_owner_c	AS	ROPAInformationOwner	,
    T1.user_id1_c	AS	ROPAUser1CID	,
    T1.information_expert_c	AS	ROPAInformationExpert	,             
    T1.ims_ropa_documents_1	AS	IMSROPADocuments	,
    T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_ms_c	AS	GDPRLawfulBasisMS	,
    T1.gdpr_special_cat_condition_m_c	AS	GDPRSpecialCategoryConditionsMS	,
    T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_ms_c	AS	DPA2018Schedule1ConditionMS	,
    T1.date_modified	AS	IMSROPADateModified	,
    T1.	ims_ropa_documents_1		AS	IMSROPADocuments,
    T1.	gdpr_lawful_basis_ms_c		AS	GDPRLawfulBasisMS,
    T1.	gdpr_special_cat_condition_m_c		AS	GDPRSpecialCategoryConditionsMS,
    T1.	dpa_2018_sch1_condition_ms_c		AS	DPA2018Schedule1ConditionMS,
    T1.	date_modified		AS	IMSROPADateModified,
    T1.	securitygroups		AS	SecurityGroups,
    T1.	assigned_user_link		AS	AssignedUserLink,
    T1.	created_by		AS	CreatedBy,
    T1.	created_by_link		AS	CreatedByLink,
    T1.	created_by_name		AS	CreatedByName,
    T1.	data_entered		AS	DateEntered,
    T1.	deleted		AS	Deleted,
    T1.	description		AS	Description,
    T1.	modified_by_name		AS	ModifiedByName,
    T1.	modified_user_id		AS	ModifiedUserID,
    T1.	modified_user_link		AS	ModifiedUserLink,
    T1.	resolution		AS	Resolution,
    T1.	rights_of_data_subject_table_c		AS	RightsOfDataSubjectTableC,
    T1.	rights_of_the_data_subject_c		AS	RightsOfTheDataSubjectC,
    T1.	work_log		AS	WorkLog,


    T2.SourceSystemID                       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat('.', 
        '.', 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.organisation_areas_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_controllers_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.joint_controller_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.categories_of_personal_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.categories_of_recipients_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.security_measures_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.third_country_names_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.third_country_safeguards_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.legitimate_interest_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.automated_decision_making_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_source_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.records_of_consent_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.location_of_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpia_required_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpia_status_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_policy_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_policy_applied_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_breach_record_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_not_adhered_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.privacy_notice_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.categories_of_individuals_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ropa_num_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_schedule,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.business_function	,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpo,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_breach_occurred_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_da_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_special_category_conditio,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_c,'.'), 
        '.', 
        IFNULL(T1.business_function_unstructured,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_temp_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.cat_of_individuals_temp_c,'.'), 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.estimated_number_of_operator_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'),              
        IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_documents_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_ms_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gdpr_special_cat_condition_m_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_ms_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.securitygroups,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.data_entered,'.'),
        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.rights_of_data_subject_table_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.rights_of_the_data_subject_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'))) AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                     AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_ropa_new T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_ropa_dim T3 
    ON  T1.ims_ropa_number = T3.ROPAID AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.ims_ropa_number = T3.IMSROPANumber AND 
                        md5(concat('.',  
                            '.', 
                            IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_number,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.organisation_areas_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.data_controllers_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.joint_controller_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.categories_of_personal_data_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.categories_of_recipients_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.security_measures_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.third_country_names_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.third_country_safeguards_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.legitimate_interest_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.automated_decision_making_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.data_source_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.records_of_consent_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.location_of_data_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.dpia_required_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.dpia_status_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.retention_policy_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.retention_policy_applied_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.data_breach_record_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.retention_not_adhered_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.privacy_notice_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.categories_of_individuals_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.ropa_num_container_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.retention_schedule,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.business_function	,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.dpo,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.data_breach_occurred_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.last_current_and_accurate_da_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.gdpr_special_category_conditio,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_c,'.'), 
                            '.', 
                            IFNULL(T1.business_function_unstructured,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_temp_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.cat_of_individuals_temp_c,'.'), 
                            '.', 
                            '.', 
                            '.', 
                            IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_ims_integration_1,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.estimated_number_of_operator_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'),              
                            IFNULL(T1.ims_ropa_documents_1,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.gdpr_lawful_basis_ms_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.gdpr_special_cat_condition_m_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.dpa_2018_sch1_condition_ms_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'),
                            IFNULL(T1.securitygroups,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.data_entered,'.'),
                            IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.rights_of_data_subject_table_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.rights_of_the_data_subject_c,'.'), 
                            IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'))) <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.IMSROPANumber IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.ims_ropa_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_ropa_new);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_ropa_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_ropa_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_ropa_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSROPAID,
    ROPAID	,
    ROPAIDCoded	,
    ROPAName	,
    ROPAAssignedUserID	,
    ROPAAssignedUserName	,
    IMSROPANumber	,
    ROPAType	,
    ROPAStatus	,
    ROPAPriority	,
    ROPAOrganisationAreas	,
    ROPADataControllers	,
    ROPAJointController	,
    ROPACategoriesPersonalData	,
    ROPACategoriesRecipients	,
    ROPASecurityMeasures	,
    ThirdCountryNames	,
    ThirdCountrySafeguards	,
    ROPALegitimateInterest	,
    ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking	,
    ROPADataSource	,
    ROPARecordsOfConsent	,
    ROPADataLocation	,
    DPIARequired	,
    DPIAStatus	,
    ROPARetentionPolicy	,
    ROPARetentionPolicyApplied	,
    ROPADataBreachRecord	,
    ROPARetentionNotAdhered	,
    ROPAPrivacyNote	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividuals	,
    ROPANumberContainer	,
    ROPAHelp	,
    ROPARetentionSchedule	,
    ROPABusinessFunction	,
    ROPADPO	,
    ROPADataBreachOcurred	,
    ROPALastCurrentAccurateData	,
    GDPRLawfulBasis	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions	,
    DPA2018Schedule1Condition	,
    RightsOfDataSubject	,
    BusinessFunctioinUnstructured	,
    BDCEntityTemp	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp	,
    DocumentsIMSROPA	,
    DocumentsIMSROPAName	,
    DocumentsIMSROPADocumentsIDA	,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration	,
    EstimatedNumberOperator	,
    ROPAUserID	,
    ROPAInformationOwner	,
    ROPAUser1CID	,
    ROPAInformationExpert	,
    IMSROPADocuments	,
    GDPRLawfulBasisMS	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditionsMS	,
    DPA2018Schedule1ConditionMS	,
    IMSROPADateModified	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_ropa_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSROPAID,
    ROPAID	,
    ROPAIDCoded	,
    ROPAName	,
    ROPAAssignedUserID	,
    ROPAAssignedUserName	,
    IMSROPANumber	,
    ROPAType	,
    ROPAStatus	,
    ROPAPriority	,
    ROPAOrganisationAreas	,
    ROPADataControllers	,
    ROPAJointController	,
    ROPACategoriesPersonalData	,
    ROPACategoriesRecipients	,
    ROPASecurityMeasures	,
    ThirdCountryNames	,
    ThirdCountrySafeguards	,
    ROPALegitimateInterest	,
    ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking	,
    ROPADataSource	,
    ROPARecordsOfConsent	,
    ROPADataLocation	,
    DPIARequired	,
    DPIAStatus	,
    ROPARetentionPolicy	,
    ROPARetentionPolicyApplied	,
    ROPADataBreachRecord	,
    ROPARetentionNotAdhered	,
    ROPAPrivacyNote	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividuals	,
    ROPANumberContainer	,
    ROPAHelp	,
    ROPARetentionSchedule	,
    ROPABusinessFunction	,
    ROPADPO	,
    ROPADataBreachOcurred	,
    ROPALastCurrentAccurateData	,
    GDPRLawfulBasis	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions	,
    DPA2018Schedule1Condition	,
    RightsOfDataSubject	,
    BusinessFunctioinUnstructured	,
    BDCEntityTemp	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp	,
    DocumentsIMSROPA	,
    DocumentsIMSROPAName	,
    DocumentsIMSROPADocumentsIDA	,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration	,
    EstimatedNumberOperator	,
    ROPAUserID	,
    ROPAInformationOwner	,
    ROPAUser1CID	,
    ROPAInformationExpert	,
    IMSROPADocuments	,
    GDPRLawfulBasisMS	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditionsMS	,
    DPA2018Schedule1ConditionMS	,
    IMSROPADateModified	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_ropa_dim
WHERE IMSROPANumber IN (SELECT IMSROPANumber FROM ims_ropa_dim_new WHERE IMSROPAID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_ropa_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_ropa_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSROPAID,
    ROPAID	,
    ROPAIDCoded	,
    ROPAName	,
    ROPAAssignedUserID	,
    ROPAAssignedUserName	,
    IMSROPANumber	,
    ROPAType	,
    ROPAStatus	,
    ROPAPriority	,
    ROPAOrganisationAreas	,
    ROPADataControllers	,
    ROPAJointController	,
    ROPACategoriesPersonalData	,
    ROPACategoriesRecipients	,
    ROPASecurityMeasures	,
    ThirdCountryNames	,
    ThirdCountrySafeguards	,
    ROPALegitimateInterest	,
    ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking	,
    ROPADataSource	,
    ROPARecordsOfConsent	,
    ROPADataLocation	,
    DPIARequired	,
    DPIAStatus	,
    ROPARetentionPolicy	,
    ROPARetentionPolicyApplied	,
    ROPADataBreachRecord	,
    ROPARetentionNotAdhered	,
    ROPAPrivacyNote	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividuals	,
    ROPANumberContainer	,
    ROPAHelp	,
    ROPARetentionSchedule	,
    ROPABusinessFunction	,
    ROPADPO	,
    ROPADataBreachOcurred	,
    ROPALastCurrentAccurateData	,
    GDPRLawfulBasis	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions	,
    DPA2018Schedule1Condition	,
    RightsOfDataSubject	,
    BusinessFunctioinUnstructured	,
    BDCEntityTemp	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp	,
    DocumentsIMSROPA	,
    DocumentsIMSROPAName	,
    DocumentsIMSROPADocumentsIDA	,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration	,
    EstimatedNumberOperator	,
    ROPAUserID	,
    ROPAInformationOwner	,
    ROPAUser1CID	,
    ROPAInformationExpert	,
    IMSROPADocuments	,
    GDPRLawfulBasisMS	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditionsMS	,
    DPA2018Schedule1ConditionMS	,
    IMSROPADateModified	,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_ropa_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_ropa_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_ropa_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_ropa_dim AS Target
USING ims_ropa_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSROPAID = Target.IMSROPAID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSROPAID,
        ROPAID	,
        ROPAIDCoded	,
        ROPAName	,
        ROPAAssignedUserID	,
        ROPAAssignedUserName	,
        IMSROPANumber	,
        ROPAType	,
        ROPAStatus	,
        ROPAPriority	,
        ROPAOrganisationAreas	,
        ROPADataControllers	,
        ROPAJointController	,
        ROPACategoriesPersonalData	,
        ROPACategoriesRecipients	,
        ROPASecurityMeasures	,
        ThirdCountryNames	,
        ThirdCountrySafeguards	,
        ROPALegitimateInterest	,
        ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking	,
        ROPADataSource	,
        ROPARecordsOfConsent	,
        ROPADataLocation	,
        DPIARequired	,
        DPIAStatus	,
        ROPARetentionPolicy	,
        ROPARetentionPolicyApplied	,
        ROPADataBreachRecord	,
        ROPARetentionNotAdhered	,
        ROPAPrivacyNote	,
        ROPACategoriesIndividuals	,
        ROPANumberContainer	,
        ROPAHelp	,
        ROPARetentionSchedule	,
        ROPABusinessFunction	,
        ROPADPO	,
        ROPADataBreachOcurred	,

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_ropa_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_ropa_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSROPAID NULLS LAST) AS IMSROPAID,
    ROPAID	,
    ROPAIDCoded	,
    ROPAName	,
    ROPAAssignedUserID	,
    ROPAAssignedUserName	,
    IMSROPANumber	,
    ROPAType	,
    ROPAStatus	,
    ROPAPriority	,
    ROPAOrganisationAreas	,
    ROPADataControllers	,
    ROPAJointController	,
    ROPACategoriesPersonalData	,
    ROPACategoriesRecipients	,
    ROPASecurityMeasures	,
    ThirdCountryNames	,
    ThirdCountrySafeguards	,
    ROPALegitimateInterest	,
    ROPAAutomatedDecisionMaking	,
    ROPADataSource	,
    ROPARecordsOfConsent	,
    ROPADataLocation	,
    DPIARequired	,
    DPIAStatus	,
    ROPARetentionPolicy	,
    ROPARetentionPolicyApplied	,
    ROPADataBreachRecord	,
    ROPARetentionNotAdhered	,
    ROPAPrivacyNote	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividuals	,
    ROPANumberContainer	,
    ROPAHelp	,
    ROPARetentionSchedule	,
    ROPABusinessFunction	,
    ROPADPO	,
    ROPADataBreachOcurred	,
    ROPALastCurrentAccurateData	,
    GDPRLawfulBasis	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditions	,
    DPA2018Schedule1Condition	,
    RightsOfDataSubject	,
    BusinessFunctioinUnstructured	,
    BDCEntityTemp	,
    ROPACategoriesIndividualsTemp	,
    DocumentsIMSROPA	,
    DocumentsIMSROPAName	,
    DocumentsIMSROPADocumentsIDA	,
    IMSROPAIMSIntegration	,
    EstimatedNumberOperator	,
    ROPAUserID	,
    ROPAInformationOwner	,
    ROPAUser1CID	,
    ROPAInformationExpert	,
    IMSROPADocuments	,
    GDPRLawfulBasisMS	,
    GDPRSpecialCategoryConditionsMS	,
